Package org.robolectric.util

Package containing general utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Function<R,T>
    Interface defining a function object.
    NamedStream
    Marker interface for InputStream that need special handling.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessibilityUtil
    Utility class for checking Views for accessibility.
    ActivityController<T extends android.app.Activity>  
    ApplicationTestUtil  
    ComponentController<C extends ComponentController<C,T>,T>  
    ContentProviderController<T extends android.content.ContentProvider>  
    FragmentController<F extends android.app.Fragment>
    Controller class for driving fragment lifecycles, similar to ActivityController.
    FragmentTestUtil  
    IntentServiceController<T extends android.app.IntentService>  
    JavaVersion  
    Join
    Utility class used to join strings together with a delimiter.
    Logger
    Logger for Robolectric.
    Pair<F,S>
    Container to ease passing around a tuple of two objects.
    ReflectionHelpers
    Collection of helper methods for calling methods and accessing fields reflectively.
    ReflectionHelpers.ClassParameter<V>
    Typed parameter used with reflective method calls.
    ReflectionHelpers.StringParameter<V>
    String parameter used with reflective method calls.
    Scheduler
    Class that manages a queue of Runnables that are scheduled to run now (or at some time in the future).
    ServiceController<T extends android.app.Service>  
    SimpleFuture<T>
    A Future represents the result of an asynchronous computation.
    SoftThreadLocal<T>
    Soft reference to a java.lang.ThreadLocal.
    Strftime
    An implementation of the Unix strftime with some glibc extensions.
    Strings
    Utility methods for dealing with strings.
    TempDirectory  
    TestRunnable  
    TimeUtils
    Utility methods for dealing with time.
    Transcript
    Test helper used to record events and assert on the order in which they happen.
    Util
    Generic collection of utility methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Scheduler.IdleState
    Describes the current state of a Scheduler.
